name: Space Oddity (Centennial Game Development Program, Casanis)
name_original: Space Oddity (Centennial Game Development Program, Casanis)
description:
Space Oddity was created for a 12 hour game jam on site at the Centennial College Nuit Blanche installation.

Fight off waves of enemies in your ever evolving spacecraft.

Space Oddity is best played with a console controller (left thumb for movement) but can be played with a mouse and keyboard (WASD).
